Both movies offer unique takes on the alien genre and are well worth watching!

Another movie worth mentioning is "Princess Mononoke." This animated film from Japan tells the story of a warrior princess in a conflict between humans and forest gods, and features an amazing cast including Billy Crudup. It's quite different from your previous preferences but might still pique your interest! Enjoy your cinematic adventures!
